short_summary: Establish a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for the supply and delivery of Prescription Safety Eyewear to Authorized Users.
description: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 7, 2023 at 2:00 pm EST. All bids submitted after 2:00 pm EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)- Prescription Safety Eyewear, Canada has a requirement to establish a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for the supply and delivery of Prescription Safety Eyewear to Authorized Users on an as and when required basis. Canada is responsible for ensuring that its employees are protected from eye injuries by providing adequate eye protection.
